details.description: Subject: Inspection of Answer Booklet of the Subject Knowledge Test for PGT (Advt. No. 18/2024 to 37/2024 except Advt. No. 21, 22 & 25/2024). Candidates can inspect their evaluated answer booklets through the link https://regn.hpsc.gov.in/pgt24/
details.eligibility: Only candidates who have registered and applied for inspection will be allowed to access the document.
details.payment_details: Payment of Rs. 500 per answer sheet is mandatory.

name: Announcement for Post Graduate Teachers (PGTs) in Biology

details.Reason for Vacancy: One post of PGT Biology under BC-B Category has to be kept vacant due to the order of Hon'ble High Court in CWP No. 3693 of 2025 â€” Ekta V/s State of Haryana & another.
details.Final Decision Status: Withheld until final decision of the Hon'ble High Court in CWP No. 3693 of 2025.

name: Inspection of Answer Booklet of the Subject Knowledge Test for Ayurvedic Medical Officer (Group-B) in Health & Ayush Department, Haryana
